name: Horror Forest 3
description:
Horror Forest 3 is the best open-world MMORPG zombie shooter on AppStore.


Kill zombies, mutants, and other creatures of apocalypse in this horror online survival!
Fight all the zombies in multiplayer co-op PvE mode with your friends or battle them in PvP deathmatch (coming soon). Don’t forget to craft better weapons before raiding on powerful bosses!

OPEN WORLD
• A city in a dark forest full of zombies awaits you,
• Explore the forest full of danger

MULTIPLAYER
• Up to 8-player online multiplayer,
• Shoot zombie with your friends

SURVIVE THE APOCALYPSE
• Develop your character by killing zombies, completing quests, grinding and other daily or time challenges,
• Collect loot from dead zombies,
• Upgrade your gear. Buy various deadly weapons, melee, pistols, machine guns, rifles, and heavy guns

IMMERSIVE GAMEPLAY
• Plot set in a 3D post-apocalyptic zombie world,
• TPP camera,
• High-quality visuals and intense music.

FANCY WARDROBE
• Be yourself, stealth ninja, battle commando, or colorful rabbit.
• Customize your weapon.

Join the community of last survivors and download ‘Horror Forest 3’ right now! The best and the only open-world MMORPG zombie shooter on AppStore.
